page.title: 07Employment in Rufforth.
page.content:
We sent out a{questionnaire}about {Employment.
We found out that{65}people were employed. {27}people travel between {nought to ten}miles a day.{8}people travel between{ten to twenty}miles to work.{12}people travel over{twenty {miles to work. 5}out of the{123 people {work shifts. 50}people are{retired.
The difference between the{retired} people and the{Employed}people is{15.} Most people travel between{ten and {twenty}miles to work in one day. Only {5}people travel over twenty miles to work.There are{19}people who are{self {Employed.}In{Rufforth}and{district there are{22}employers,{11}of whom are farmers. One is{North Yorkshire County {Council}and the rest operate private businesses.
